                                   +----org.webmacro.datatable.ResultSetDataTable
public class ResultSetDataTable
extends SimpleDataTable
an implementation of the DataTable interface for managing JDBC ResultSet data in a way that is convenient for use with WebMacro templates.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Keats Kirsch
Since:
11-Sep-00
